text: Lenka von Koerber (born Helene Irmgard Louise von der Leyen 16 March 1888 West Prussia â€“ July 21, 1958 Leipzig) was a German journalist and writer. == Life == She joined the peace movement, and from 1918 to 1930 the German Democratic Party. She advocated for prison reform. She was a member of Deutscher Schriftstellerverband. == Works == * Soviet Russia Fights Crime, New York, E.P. Dutton and Co., 1935. == References == Category:1888 births Category:1958 deaths Category:German journalists
title: Lenka von Koerber
